page.title: 15Homeopathy
page.content: Dr.Hughes-Games came to school to talk about homeopathy.This is a medical system which engages "like to cure like".Homeopathy is derived from the greek. (HOMIOS = like: PATHOS =suffering).Our bodies are like fortresses with men_at_arms at all times ready to fight the enemy. Homeopathy really started with a German, Dr.Hahnemann.In 1970 he was experimenting with quinine as a cure for malaria.He gave his friends doses of quinine and discovered that they developed the same symptons as malaria.A cure for sore thoats is said to be made from bella donna.What you do is crush up a particular plant with alcohol and water.What you get is called "mother tincture".Then you take one drop of this mixture and dilute it in 100 drops of water and alcohol.You do this 6 times to make it strength 6.
